name: Poligron
description:
Simple puzzle game where the player controls a flipping cube.

To complete each level, the cube has to interact with various objects, but to do so it must be first marked with the proper color group in order to interact with them in the level.
However, once the cube is marked with a color grouop, it cannot be marked anymore.... unless it happens to 'forget' the first imprint. 

PS. It's adviced to play on Chrome.

Developed by Andrea Amato and Davide Amato.
